I'd highly recommend "My Own Private Idaho" for you! This captivating film follows two best friends, one of whom is bisexual, on a journey of self-discovery. Keanu Reeves and River Phoenix deliver mesmerizing performances in this unique exploration of identity and friendship.

If you're interested in a more unconventional take, "Velvet Goldmine" is another intriguing choice. This film delves into the glam rock scene of the 1970s with a bisexual protagonist, played by Christian Bale, who investigates the life and career of a legendary glam superstar.
